title: Triumph Speed 400 gets free accessories
description: Triumph is offering the Speed 400 with accessories worth Rs 7,600 for no added cost. However, this offer is only valid until July 31st. Triumph has bundled accessories worth Rs 7,600 for free, this offer is valid till July 31.

Triumph is offering the Speed 400 with accessories worth Rs 7,600 for no added cost. However, this offer is only valid until July 31st.

  1. Triumph Speed 400 gets engine guard for free
  2. Offer also includes flyscreen, knee pads and tank pad
  3. Valid until July 31 and subject to availability of accessories

Triumph Speed 400 gets more for the same price

Practical add-ons now standard for a limited time

Triumph is offering a set of accessories worth Rs 7,600 with every new Speed 400 at no extra charge — valid for purchases made before July 31. 

The accessories include lower engine bars, knee pads, a transparent flyscreen and a tank pad. While the knee and tank pads are nice to have, it’s the engine guard and windscreen that add real functional value — offering protection from road debris and reducing wind-blast at higher speeds.

This bundle now makes the Speed 400 an even stronger value proposition without increasing its sticker price. However, this offer is only valid till July 31 and is subject to availability of the accessories. 

The Speed 400 is currently priced at Rs 2.46 lakh
